titles.title: For the relief of Merrill Lannen.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 103-604.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 12.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Glenn without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 697.

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Deems a named individual to be an employee whose transfer from the United States Postal Service to the United States Army Corps of Engineers in March 1985 entitled him to travel, transportation, and relocation expenses.
